Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
Please select one of two versions, depending on whether METSIM T2D-GENES data is used:
1. For the METSIM study: We thank the METSIM investigators and study participants for making their data available. This manuscript was not prepared in collaboration with the METSIM investigators and does not necessarily reflect the opinions or views of the METSIM study or the NIDDK.
2. For METSIM T2D-GENES data (phs001100): The METSIM T2D-GENES sequencing study was conducted by the METSIM T2D-GENES sequencing study Investigators and supported by the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK). The data from the METSIM T2D-GENES sequencing study reported here were supplied by the University of Eastern Finland, University of Michigan, and Broad Institute. This manuscript was not prepared in collaboration with Investigators of the METSIM T2D-GENES sequencing study and does not necessarily reflect the opinions or views of the METSIM T2D-GENES sequencing study, or the NIDDK.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area
ConsentGroup.name: EA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Access limited to study investigators only.
